item.title: [Python] A memorandum that I tried using eigen3
item.description: ## Overview We pursue arbitrary precision diagonalization (dense matrix, sparse matrix) and try various things. I met a library called eigen yesterday and installed it today and used it, so I recorded it as a log. As an arbitrary precision diagonalization, Mpack implements diagonalization of symmetric and Hermite classes of dense matrices, but since sparse matrices are not provided by lapack in the first place, coarse matrices cannot be solved efficiently.
